product_name: Core Concepts Roundhouse Half-Zip Sweater - Women's - 2013 Overstock
long_description: When winter sends a chilly gust of wind your way, retreat into the oversized cowl-neck collar of the wind-resistant, Italian-wool-blend Roundhouse Half-Zip Sweater from Core Concepts. Made of Italian tech wool-blend fabric, this warm sweater weighs less and dries faster than all-wool knits. Features stretchy rib-knit oversize collar, cuffs, hem and openings of the kangaroo-style pocket. Half-front zipper lets you vent heat and has a soft chin guard. Core Concepts Roundhouse Half-Zip Sweater for women is machine washable. Overstock.
short_description: When winter sends a chilly gust of wind your way, retreat into the oversized cowl-neck collar of the wind-resistant, Italian-wool-blend Roundhouse Half-Zip Sweater from Core Concepts.
